attributes.action: Consider Free School Buses and Travel Passes AND Incentives for Companies to Run Staff Shuttle Schemes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road-pricing itself won’t change car use. We are creatures of habit. If you don't give us a good reason to change, if it takes longer or isn’t any cheaper, we won’t change. We want to know, what's in it for us? If I took public transport to work it would take over an hour & cost me £4 a day instead of 15 mins by car for a few pence, so I take my car! Parents drop their kids to school en-route to work or because it's quicker and safer, or just out of habit. How about this? As well as free use of regular bus services a School Shuttles in towns/cities. Take kids to pick-up points & know that they will be safely dropped at school & the same going home. What about tax incentives to companies that lay on staff buses at peak times? Dropped at the office door for say £1 each way? Make buses more energy efficient while your at it too! They're hardly environmentally friendly! Each bus on the road takes more cars off the road. If yr a student who wants free travel for students go to: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/passes/.
